name: Scrape LinkedIn Search Results And Store in Google Sheets
description:
Using this template you can export your search results from a LinkedIn search into Google Sheets. 

To use the template, simply setup your search in LinkedIn, then copy the url, paste it in here and you are ready to go. 

To give you a jumpstart, we have created this Google Sheet template you can use to collect your search result. Simply make a copy of the sheets and use that in the Google Sheets module.
